name: Police Moto Mission: City Crim
description:
Police Moto Mission: City Crime is an action packed, super exciting police and thief chasing simulator game. Drive on highway roads among traffic cars and trucks at blazingly fast speeds. In real racing challenge increase your speed as fast as you can to score high.
Features:
- Realistic police bike driving experience
- Smooth & simple controls
- Visually attractive 3D environment
- Cop vs robbers chase adventure missions
- Realistic super motorbike physics
- Fast driving
